commit.message: Refactor arc() and ellipse() to use lyon_geom::Arc

Auto merge of #25801 - pylbrecht:arc.refactor, r=jdm

Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D.arc() and .ellipse()

<!-- Please describe your changes on the following line: -->
Refactor `arc()` and `ellipse()` to make use of `lyon_geom::Arc` for approximating an arc with quadratic bezier curves.

---
<!-- Thank you for contributing to Servo! Please replace each `[ ]` by `[X]` when the step is complete, and replace `___` with appropriate data: -->
- [x] `./mach build -d` does not report any errors
- [x] `./mach test-tidy` does not report any errors
- [x] These changes fix part of #25331

<!-- Either: -->
- [x] There are tests for these changes

<!-- Also, please make sure that "Allow edits from maintainers" checkbox is checked, so that we can help you if you get stuck somewhere along the way.-->

<!-- Pull requests that do not address these steps are welcome, but they will require additional verification as part of the review process. -->

parent 0f9b04680a27e7503bb2ebceb41c5abc8d59a294

author bors-servo <lbergstrom+bors@mozilla.com> 1582725848 -0500
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1582725848 -0500

Auto merge of #25801 - pylbrecht:arc.refactor, r=jdm

Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D.arc() and .ellipse()

<!-- Please describe your changes on the following line: -->
Refactor `arc()` and `ellipse()` to make use of `lyon_geom::Arc` for approximating an arc with quadratic bezier curves.

---
<!-- Thank you for contributing to Servo! Please replace each `[ ]` by `[X]` when the step is complete, and replace `___` with appropriate data: -->
- [x] `./mach build -d` does not report any errors
- [x] `./mach test-tidy` does not report any errors
- [x] These changes fix part of #25331

<!-- Either: -->
- [x] There are tests for these changes

<!-- Also, please make sure that "Allow edits from maintainers" checkbox is checked, so that we can help you if you get stuck somewhere along the way.-->

<!-- Pull requests that do not address these steps are welcome, but they will require additional verification as part of the review process. -->

files.patch:
@@ -489,6 +489,7 @@ dependencies = [
  "half",
  "ipc-channel",
  "log",
+ "lyon_geom 0.14.0",
  "num-traits",
  "pixels",
  "raqote",

@@ -29,6 +29,7 @@ gleam = "0.6.7"
 half = "1"
 ipc-channel = "0.14"
 log = "0.4"
+lyon_geom = "0.14"
 num-traits = "0.2"
 raqote = {git = "https://github.com/jrmuizel/raqote"}
 time = { version = "0.1.0", optional = true }

-
